markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 17"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Forge-Blessed Shot](/Feats.aspx?ID=3292) <actions string="Free Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Divine" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=48" />
<trait label="Dwarf" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=54" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Guns & Gears](/Sources.aspx?ID=98) pg. 201 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Frequency**
once per day

**Prerequisites**
worshipper of [Torag](/Deities.aspx?ID=18) or [Angradd](/Deities.aspx?ID=84)

**Access**
You are from Dongun Hold or Alkenstar.

**Trigger**
You attempt a ranged Strike.

</column>

---

You intone a prayer to the dwarven deities Torag or Angradd, willing a higher power to guide your aim in the heat of battle. On your next Strike with a ranged weapon before the end of your turn, you gain a +2 circumstance bonus to your attack roll and ignore your target's concealed condition, as well as your target's lesser, standard, and greater cover.
